targets.expr: (sum(rate(scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_write_timeouts{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}[$__rate_interval])) or on() vector(0)) + (sum(rate(scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_read_timeouts{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}[$__rate_interval])) or on() vector(0))>0

panels.description: The percentage of the time during which Scylla utilized the CPU. Note that because Scylla does busy polling for some time before going idle, CPU utilization as seen by the operating system may be much higher. Your system is not yet CPU-bottlenecked until this metric is high.
panels.title: Load

panels.description: The number of nodes configured in the cluster.
panels.title: # Nodes

panels.description:
The number of CPU Cores actively used in the cluster.

Note that CPU Cores that belongs to unreachable nodes, or nodes that are not in normal mode, will not be counted
panels.title: # Cores

panels.description: Write attempts - include all writes that reached the coordinator node, even if they will eventually fail
panels.title: Writes/s

panels.description: Read attempts - include all reads that reached the coordinator node, even if they will eventually fail
panels.title: Reads/s

panels.description: Holds the number of currently active compactions.
panels.title: Running Compactions

value.title: OS Information Dashboard, an Error indicates there are OS related errors

targets.expr: 0*scylla_scylladb_current_version{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"} + on (instance) group_left() (scylla_node_operation_mode{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}!= 3 or on (instance) ((scylla_gossip_live{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}+1<  bool scalar(count(scylla_node_operation_mode{cluster="$cluster"}==3)))*6 + 3))

(sum(scylla_cql:non_system_prepared1m{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}) by (instance) >bool 1) + (sum(rate(scylla_cql_reverse_queries{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}[$__rate_interval])) by(instance) >bool 1) + (sum(scylla_cql:non_paged_no_system1m{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}) by (instance) >bool 1)

(min(scylla_streaming_finished_percentage{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}*100) by (instance) < 100) or on (instance) (min(scylla_node_ops_finished_percentage{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}*100) by (instance) < 100) or on (instance)  0*sum(scylla_scylladb_current_version{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}) by (instance)

panels.description: Write attempts - include all writes that reached the coordinator node, even if they will eventually fail

targets.expr: sum(rate(scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_write_latency_count{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]]) or on([[by]]) sum(rate(scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_write_latency_summary_count{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]])

sum(rate(scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_write_latency_count{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}[$__rate_interval] offset 1d)) or on ([[by]]) sum(rate(scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_write_latency_summary_count{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}[$__rate_interval] offset 1d))

sum(rate(scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_write_latency_count{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}[$__rate_interval] offset 1w)) or on ([[by]]) sum(rate(scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_write_latency_summary_count{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}[$__rate_interval] offset 1w))

panels.title: Writes

panels.description: Requests that Scylla tried to write but timed out. Timeouts are counted in the node that received the request (the coordinator), not at the replicas.
panels.title: Write Timeouts by [[by]]

panels.description: Read attempts - include all reads that reached the coordinator node, even if they will eventually fail
panels.title: Reads

panels.description: Requests that Scylla tried to read but timed out. Timeouts are counted in the node that received the request (the coordinator), not at the replicas.

targets.expr: (sum(rate(scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_read_timeouts{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]]) or vector(0))+on([[by]]) (sum(rate(scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_cas_read_timeouts{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]]) or vector(0))+on([[by]]) (sum(rate(scylla_storage_proxy_coordinator_range_timeouts{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc"}[$__rate_interval])) by ([[by]]) or vector(0))

panels.title: Read Timeouts by [[by]]
